title: Foodies Guide to Kitchen Magic
description: Can Aidan's kitchen wizardry cook up a hot career or a steamy romance?Take one timid but curvy cook, Aidan, who discovers she can perform magic in the kitchen--literally. Add a healthy pinch of desire to become a famous Hollywood chef. Stir in Matteus, the unexpectedly sexy appraiser from the Institute of Magical Instruction. Sprinkle with mutual attraction.Just one teensy Aidan can't cook - not even boil water.At some point in every woman's life, she wishes she could do magic. But will Aidan cook up true love, a career...or just a disaster?
author: Sandra Sookoo
